comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: These are the same men who were identified on an earlier photo in this series as members of the 12th Pennsylvania Volunteers.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Wystan: Thanks for spotting this was the same group. We'll add this info. to the description next time we update.

comment.author: 37401346@N00
comment._content: This is the 106th. As I've noted earlier, the man holding the flag is Giles Coons. The man behind him is his wife's brother and my Great Great grandfather John Rockwell. An original photo  not seen here hangs in my fathers hallway.
